BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Seems like a number of unusual ruins fell
at <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.

I'm going there to investigate.<sp:5:1:0> But a
traveler type like you might want to check
it out, see the sights, that sort of thing.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Sounds like the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>near
here got taken over. Now that thing
is a <clr:0000>monster fort<clr:ffff>.
That's rough. None of us will be using
that tower for a good, long while.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You hear this? The <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff> they
built nearby got taken over! Yep, it's a
<clr:0000>monster lair <clr:ffff>now.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>Only fair that the monsters should pay
some rent on the place.<sp:5:1:0> But, yeah. Looks
like none of us can use that place now.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Standing out in the open like this, you
really see how the world's changed.<sp:5:0:0>

Not a lot of new stuff gets me all that
excited anymore. I mean, what can beat
RUINS just falling out of the SKY?
But...<sp:5:0:0> A lot of ruins fell on <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>, and they say all
of them are unusual.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Still, unusual is totally usual now. Not
interested. Hey, if it was REALLY weird,
though, I'd be off to see it in a shot.
BackRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've been traveling all over the place,
surveying the <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>. They've been
spotted throughout the land.
I had it on good authority that there's
one around here too.

But I've walked as much as I'm going to
walk and still haven't found it.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Guess it was on bad authority.<sp:5:0:0> That or
I'm just bad at finding it.
BeforeMeetPurah_01_2:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive><clr:ffff>You'll find <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff> just before
<clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>. Head that way
if you want get your bearings.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'll just come right out and say what I'm
doing around here—I'm investigating the
<clr:0000>Zonai ruins<clr:ffff> in this area.
Problem is that SO many ruins fell all
over the place, getting to every one is
taking a LOT of time.
Good thing there's that <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>
built near here. We can use that thing
to blast ourselves high into the sky.
But what do I do once I'm up there?<sp:5:0:0>
Fall, that's what!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>There's no way I'm going to risk that for
the sake of investigating some ruins!
BeforeMeetPurah_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hmm? <sp:5:0:0>What's going on?<sp:5:0:0> You lose your
way out here maybe?<sp:5:0:0>

You know <clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>,
right?<sp:5:0:0> Just short of that is a place called
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.
Lots of people and resources are
gathered there these days.<sp:5:1:0> Head there
if you're trying to get your bearings.
<snd:TalkPositive_00>You got all that? It's a pretty big deal.<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>...to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Young guy like you? Yeah, you're going
to climb slopes on a rainy day, even if
you might slip and fall to your ruin.
Just be careful, OK?
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Got a minute?<sp:5:0:0> You, uh, happen to see
a <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>near here?

They say there's one somewhere in this
area. But I've looked AND looked, and
now I doubt there's one at all.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>I bet some fool got his foot stuck in a
hole, got home late, and told everyone
he fell into a chasm. Ugh, people.
Near_BackRange_01: I'll have to see for myself.
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>What's going on? <sp:5:1:0>You looking for
someone to talk to?

Hey, that's fine by me. <sp:5:0:0>Let's talk.<sp:5:1:0>
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>You can blast yourself high into the sky
using the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff> nearby.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You won't catch me doing that.<sp:5:0:0> That sky
is, uh, awful high up there.
Near_Rain: Did I get it all wrong?
BackRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>They said a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> is around here
somewhere, but come on...<sp:5:0:0> Where is
it already?
I've searched and searched. If someone
found that thing, it got itself unfound.
Maybe my information was wrong...
Near_GoRange_02: Up is easy. Down is hard.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>One thing that's odd here...<sp:5:1:0> Everyone
keeps talking about cooking.

If I were hungry, I might think they were
rubbing all this food talk in my face.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Not a problem though. I've got some
ingredients now. Maybe I'll use the
cooking pot and make some grub!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>How about I ask you?<sp:5:0:0> You see a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>
near here?
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Sounds like a number of unusual ruins fell
near <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.

I'm headed there for sure. But, uh, not
anytime soon. Young guy like you,
though?<sp:5:1:0> I bet you're going to bolt for it.
GoalPoint_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You know, a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>—a deep, deep,
deep hole.<sp:5:0:0> Haven't you heard about
those appearing?
These things are SO big, you can't see
bottom. But what's weird about this
chasm is...<sp:5:0:0>I can't manage to find it at all.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Maybe it's hidden? Maybe chasms aren't
always big? Maybe some are small?

Or maybe...<sp:5:0:0>our world up here is actually
BELOW whatever's down there. So up
here is really under all that.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Ha! Never mind. My mind kind of, er, fell
on its face there.
GoalPoint_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>You haven't? Huh.<sp:5:0:0> S'pose you're telling
me to give up looking maybe?

Is that it? Guess I'm just taking advice
from passers-by these days. Guess you're
saying I should quit?
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice>Oh. That's NOT what you meant? Sorry,
sorry. Really.

S'pose I'll keep on looking, then. Can't
give up yet.
GoRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>There's supposed to be a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> here
somewhere. But I've looked all over the
place and can't find it.
I just know someone blew this all out of
proportion. Someone got stuck in a little
hole and cried, "Oh no, chasm!"
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>All the talk of cooking here...it's making
my stomach rumble.

Just ate. But I'll eat again, I guess.
StartPoint_01_3:
If I go into the field hungry, I might fall on
my face out there, and if that happens,
it's all over. Lights out.
You've gotta eat your three square a day.
That's investigation 101.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>How goes it? Hmm?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Ah! Don't tell me! Did you see...<sp:5:0:0>maybe
a...<sp:5:0:0> Maybe a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> near here?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Might be imagining things, but you look
like you're in a hurry.

On rainy days, slopes get slippery, so
you be careful if you go climbing.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>They say that a number of unusual ruins
fell near <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>. That's <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>
from here.
Looks like the kind of thing that'd interest
you.<sp:5:0:0> Who knows? If it's interesting
enough, I might head there too.
